name: Display QR code on Relying Party service
scenarioId: ios/Age_verification_using_age_over_18_pseudonym_attestation_POC_16/AV_POC-Presenting_Age_Verification_attestation-remote_same_device_42/ageVerificationAttestationCrossDevice:Display QR code on Relying Party service
methodName: Display QR code on Relying Party service

testSteps.description: Given the user visits the Relying Party service on a different device from the one where the wallet app is installed
When the Relying Party service displays a QR code
Then the user views the QR code

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to present my Age Verification Attestation to a requesting Relying Party on a different device
  So that I can prove that I am over 18 years old without revealing my age or any other personal information

title: Display QR code on Relying Party service
